page.title: 07Leisure and Recreation.
page.content: The amount of{leisure time}available is increasing as people take{early {retirement}in their fifties, more people are also being made{redundant and many are{unemployed. In active pursuits{swimming}is more popular among all age groups, 60% of people swim. The close proximity of {Chapeltown Baths}is an advantage. In addition to sports activities, many keep fit by{jogging, walking}and {hiking.}Cycling is restricted to local streets. There is a{B.M.X. track}which is popular. 70% of adults enjoy{gardening and DIY. Listening to{music}is popular amongst most age groups and 70% of people of all ages rate{watching T.V.}as their favourite way of spending leisure time. Many adults pass their evenings by visits to{Public Houses and Clubs.
